text: Hi <@U02EFVAAGCR> maybe you can help on this?

Not sure if the right channel, but what's the easiest way to debug the Code Snippet in Chatflows?
And is there any more info on limitations and so on?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/code-snippets-in-bots>

I need help with an issue. I have written a custom coded workflow to send deal data to a custom API, which works great. BUT, the external API is behind a firewall that does whitelisting via IP addresses. Has anyone come up with a workaround since HubSpot does not have dedicated IP addresses for workflows?
The best thing you can do is to setup a proxy server (with a static ip), then have the custom code send to the proxy server and the proxy server send to the api
I was afraid someone would say that, because thatâ€™s the next way I was going to try.
of course, yeah because custom coded actions run on Lambdas they are super reliable and scalable but that does come with the drawback on having the ip change randomly
